name: 2.75' rocket M257 Parachute Illumination
description:
The Hydra 70 rocket is a 2.75-inch (70 mm) diameter fin-stabilized unguided rocket used primarily in the air-to-ground role.

It can be equipped with a variety of warheads, this particular version using the M257 Illumination warhead, together with a parachute, to illuminate areas at night.
